text: Sahara Samay is a Hindi-language 24/7 news television channel, owned by Sahara India Pariwar. The channel is a free-to-air and launched on 28 March 2003. The channel is available across all major cable and DTH platforms as well as online. The network offers five regional 24x7 news channels catering to millions and millions of Hindi speaking viewers in the states of U.P./Uttarakhand, M.P./Chattisgarh, Bihar/Jharkhand, Delhi/NCR and Mumbai. Additionally the network also offers 'Samay', a 24-hr national news channel broadcast in over 66 countries. ==Notable people== * Upenderra Rai CEO and editor-in-chief of Sahara News Network * Dr. Meena Sharma worked here aged 26 gaining government recognition for her work. ==References== Category:Hindi- language television channels in India Category:Television channels and stations established in 2004 Category:Hindi-language television stations Category:Television stations in New Delhi
